## ğŸ§  Jarvis Voice Assistant â€” GUI Chat + Voice Powered with Gemini AI

A lightweight, beautiful desktop voice assistant app built with `Tkinter`, `SpeechRecognition`, `pyttsx3`, and Google Gemini API. It can:

* Listen for voice commands with or without wake word
* Execute search queries or open websites
* Ask Gemini AI to answer your questions
* Support typed chat mode (no mic required)
* Run directly from Python or standalone `.exe` (Windows)

---

## ğŸš€ Features


| Mode                        | Description                                               |
| --------------------------- | --------------------------------------------------------- |
| **ğŸ™ Wake Word Mode**       | Waits for the wake word`"hello"`before listening          |
| **âš¡ Instant Command Mode** | Listens instantly without wake word (duration adjustable) |
| **ğŸ’¬ Chat Mode**            | Type commands directly in GUI (no voice used)             |

---

## ğŸ“¦ Installation

> âœ… Python 3.8+ required only if you're running from source.

## ğŸª„ Run From `.exe` (Windows)

1. Go to the folder containing `Jarvis.exe`
2. Double-click to launch
3. The assistant window will open
4. Choose your preferred mode:
   * ğŸ™ Wake Word Mode
   * âš¡ Instant Mode (adjust listen time with slider)
   * ğŸ’¬ Chat Mode (type commands manually)

> ğŸ’¡ No need to install Python or libraries when using `.exe`

---

## ğŸ® How to Use

### ğŸ§  Commands Examples:


| Say / Type             | What it does                 |
| ---------------------- | ---------------------------- |
| `open youtube.com`     | Opens website                |
| `open instagram`       | Google searches if no domain |
| `search AI news`       | Opens browser with search    |
| `answer me what is AI` | Uses Gemini API to answer    |
| `stop`                 | Exits the app                |

---

### ğŸ’¡ Tips:

* Adjust **listen time** using the slider in âš¡ Instant Mode
* In ğŸ’¬ Chat Mode: text box & `Send` button will appear
* Gemini answers are smart, short & fast thanks to `gemini-2.0-flash`
